# 5.0 Docs

- [Breaking change: CA1416: Platform compatibility](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/code-analysis/5.0/ca1416-platform-compatibility-analyzer.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 5 caused by the enablement of code analysis rule CA1416.
- [Breaking change: CA1417: OutAttribute on string parameter for P/Invoke](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/code-analysis/5.0/ca1417-outattributes-on-pinvoke-string-parameters.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 5 caused by the enablement of code analysis rule CA1417.
- [Breaking change: CA1831: Use AsSpan instead of Range-based indexers for string](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/code-analysis/5.0/ca1831-range-based-indexer-on-string.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 5 caused by the enablement of code analysis rule CA1831.
- [Breaking change: CA2013: Do not use ReferenceEquals with value types](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/code-analysis/5.0/ca2013-referenceequals-on-value-types.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 5 caused by the enablement of code analysis rule CA2013.
- [Breaking change: CA2014: Do not use stackalloc in loops](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/code-analysis/5.0/ca2014-stackalloc-in-loops.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 5 caused by the enablement of code analysis rule CA2014.
- [Breaking change: CA2015: Do not define finalizers for types derived from MemoryManager<T>](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/code-analysis/5.0/ca2015-finalizers-for-memorymanager-types.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 5 caused by the enablement of code analysis rule CA2015.
- [Breaking change: CA2200: Rethrow to preserve stack details](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/code-analysis/5.0/ca2200-rethrow-to-preserve-stack-details.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 5 caused by the enablement of code analysis rule CA2200.
- [Breaking change: CA2247: Argument to TaskCompletionSource constructor should be TaskCreationOptions value](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/code-analysis/5.0/ca2247-ctor-arg-should-be-taskcreationoptions.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 5 caused by the enablement of code analysis rule CA2247.
